message: Let's start fair. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. I think it's a reasonable starting point, and I hope you'll agree.
I think your offer was a bit too generous, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm going to take a slightly larger share this time.
Bob, your last offer was a bit too aggressive. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least 45 dollars to make this worthwhile for me. Let's split it 45/55 this time. What do you say?
I'm not willing to give you 55, but I'm willing to meet you at 45. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the inflation.
